titles.title: Life Out Thy Life Within Me (easy nice)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Live out Thy life within me O Jesus King of kings Be Thou Thyself the answer To all my questionings Live out Thy life within me In all things have Thy way I the transparent medium Thy glory to display{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}The temple has been yielded And purified of sin Let Thy shekinah glory Now flash forth from within And all the earth keep silence The body henceforth be Thy silent docile servant Moved only as by Thee{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Its members every moment Held subject to Thy call Ready to have Thee use them Or not be used at all Held without restless longing Or strain or stress or fret Or chafings at Thy dealings Or thoughts of vain regret{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}But restful calm and pliant From bend and bias free Permitting Thee to settle When Thou hast need of me Live out Thy life within me O Jesus King of kings Be Thou the glorious answer To all my questionings{/lang-eng}
